title: Beacon in the Thunderstorm
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed photorealistic render, an epic vertical shot (9:16) of a solitary white lighthouse with a red lantern cap, standing firmly on rugged, dark granite cliffs during a severe thunderstorm. Massive, turbulent deep-blue ocean waves crash violently against the rocks, generating dramatic white sea spray and mist. The sky is dominated by dark, swirling storm clouds with heavy rain streaks visible. A prominent lightning bolt illuminates the sea in the background. The powerful lighthouse beam cuts sharply through the gloom. Moody, dramatic lighting, high contrast, cinematic atmosphere, 8K photorealistic photography.
negativePrompt: blurry, low quality, noise, cropped, worst quality, inaccurate, distortion, painting, illustration, cartoon, sketch, watermark, signature, multiple limbs, deformed, ugly, flat colors
